Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
low-key \low-key\ low-keyed \low-keyed\adj. restrained in style or quality; not flashy or intense; understated; as, a little masterpiece of low-keyed eloquence.
Syn: subdued. [WordNet 1.5]
low-key adj : restrained in style or quality; "a little masterpiece of low-keyed eloquence" [syn: {low-keyed}, {subdued}]
